net.dragondelve.customdriversutil.util

Class Configurator

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.dragondelve.customdriversutil.util.Configurator

  • public class Configurator
extends java.lang.Object
    A non installable class with a single instance. It loads the current configuration of the program and allows parts of the program to access the data in the configuration. In order to get access to it's only instance you should use the static method getInstance().

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private Configuration configuration
      The configuration of the program.
      private static java.lang.String CONFIGURATION_DEFAULT_PATHNAME
      A default pathname where the configuration is stored.
      private static Configurator instance
      The only instance of Configurator.

    • Constructor Summary

      Private constructor.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Configurator

        private Configurator()
        Private constructor. it is private to ensure that only one instance of configurator exists per program.

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static Configurator getInstance()
        Lightweight accessor method.
        Returns:
        the only instance of Configurator.

      • getConfiguration

        public Configuration getConfiguration()
        Lightweight accessor method.
        Returns:
        program's current configuration.

      • setConfiguration

        public void setConfiguration(Configuration configuration)
        Lightweight mutator method.
        Parameters:
        configuration - program's new configuration, Should only be used if loadConfiguration has failed.

      • loadConfiguration

        public boolean loadConfiguration()
        Attempts to load the configuration from the default pathname. If it fails to load the configuration it will return false, if it succeeds in loading the configuration it will return true, allowing the GUI to alert the user of configuration file becoming corrupted or missing.
        Returns:
        True if loading succeeded, false if the configuration loading failed.

      • loadConfiguration

        public boolean loadConfiguration(java.lang.String pathname)
        Attempts to load the configuration from a file at a provided pathname. If it fails to load the configuration it will return false, if it succeeds in loading the configuration it will return true, allowing the GUI to alert the user of configuration file becoming corrupted or missing.
        Parameters:
        pathname - pathnamne to an XML file that contains a configuration.
        Returns:
        True if loading succeeded, false if the configuration loading failed.

      • saveConfiguration

        public boolean saveConfiguration()
        Saves the current configuration to the defeault pathname, that is defined in CONFIGURATION_DEFAULT_PATHNAME
        Returns:
        True if the save succeeded, false if the configuration save failed.

      • saveConfiguration

        public boolean saveConfiguration(java.lang.String pathname)
        Saves the current configuration to the given pathname.
        Parameters:
        pathname - pathname to which the configuration file is going to be saved.
        Returns:
        True if the save succeeded, false if the configuration save failed.
